placesToVisit.description: A symbol of freedom and democracy, a gift from France to the United States.
A vast urban park with a variety of attractions, including a zoo, a carousel, and a castle.
A vibrant and bustling commercial intersection, famous for its bright lights and billboards.
The main square in central Mexico City, surrounded by historic buildings.
An ancient Mesoamerican city with impressive pyramids and temples.
The former home of the famous Mexican artist, now a museum dedicated to her life and work.
An iconic observation tower with panoramic views of the city and Lake Ontario.
Canada's largest museum, with a diverse collection of art, culture, and natural history.
A popular attraction with a variety of marine life, including sharks, turtles, and jellyfish.
A famous sidewalk with more than 2,600 stars embedded in the pavement.
A popular destination with an amusement park, an aquarium, and a variety of restaurants.
An observatory with stunning views of the city and the Hollywood Sign.
A large urban park with a variety of attractions, including a seawall, a totem pole display, and an aquarium.
A vibrant arts and crafts community with a public market, theaters, and galleries.
A suspension bridge that crosses the Capilano River, with stunning views of the surrounding forest.
